description:
Makoto is irritated by Erio`s attempt to escape reality by making herself believe that everything was done by aliens. He wants to have her accept reality. However, Meme sits down with Makoto and tells him to just leave Erio alone.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: A Strange Moment for a Girl Bound to the Ground
Chi o Hau Shoujo no Fushigi na Setsuna
地を這う少女の不思議な刹那
